book.synopsis: A trio of works come together in an omnibus edition that includes Flesh, Strange Relations, and The Lovers, in which Hal Yarrow visits the planet Ozagen, where he falls in love with a humanoid alien female whose alcoholism he tries to cure without realizing that alcohol prevents pregnancy. Original.
book.dimensions: Height: 9 Inches, Length: 6.1 Inches, Weight: 1.2 Pounds, Width: 1.2 Inches
